question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-faucet/metrics-server/src/gather_metrics.rs] [Line 15-43] [Stack allocation] The function allocates total and families_over_2000 on the stack - can deep call stacks or recursive calls cause stack overflow in constrained environments? (Low)
